languages.text: "Я знал, что вы поймете мое стремление послужить Империуму так, как того требует закон, Ваша Светлость!"

traits.locale_text: "Я знал, что вы поймете мое стремление послужить Империуму так, как того требует закон, Ваша Светлость!"

languages.text: "I knew you would appreciate my efforts to serve the Imperium as the law commands, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!"
languages.original_text: "Я знал, что вы поймете мое стремление послужить Империуму так, как того требует закон, Ваша Светлость!"

traits.locale_text: "I knew you would appreciate my efforts to serve the Imperium as the law commands, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!"
"I knew you would appreciate my efforts to serve the Imperium as the law commands, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!"
"I knew you would appreciate my efforts to serve the Imperium as the law commands, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!"
"I knew you would appreciate my efforts to serve the Imperium as the law commands, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!"

languages.text: “我就知道，您会欣赏我为了帝国所付出的所有努力，大人！”
languages.original_text: "I knew you would appreciate my efforts to serve the Imperium as the law commands, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!"

traits.locale_text: “我就知道，您会欣赏我为了帝国所付出的所有努力，大人！”

languages.text: «¡Sabía que apreciaría mis esfuerzos por servir al Imperium de acuerdo con la ley, mi{mf|lord|lady}!».
languages.original_text: "I knew you would appreciate my efforts to serve the Imperium as the law commands, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Sabía que apreciaría mis esfuerzos por servir al Imperium de acuerdo con la ley, mi{mf|lord|lady}!».

languages.text: 「法に従い帝国に尽くす私の献身を評価いただきありがとうございます、陛下！」
languages.original_text: "I knew you would appreciate my efforts to serve the Imperium as the law commands, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!"

traits.locale_text: 「法に従い帝国に尽くす私の献身を評価いただきありがとうございます、陛下！」

languages.text: "Ich wusste, Ihr würdet mein Bestreben, dem Imperium gesetzeskonform zu dienen, zu schätzen wissen, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}!"
languages.original_text: "I knew you would appreciate my efforts to serve the Imperium as the law commands, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich wusste, Ihr würdet mein Bestreben, dem Imperium gesetzeskonform zu dienen, zu schätzen wissen, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}!"

languages.text: « Je savais que vous reconnaîtriez mes efforts pour servir l'Imperium comme la loi l'ordonne, Votre Seigneurie ! »
languages.original_text: "I knew you would appreciate my efforts to serve the Imperium as the law commands, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!"

traits.locale_text: « Je savais que vous reconnaîtriez mes efforts pour servir l'Imperium comme la loi l'ordonne, Votre Seigneurie ! »

languages.text: "İmparatorluk'a kanunların emrettiği gibi hizmet etme çabamı takdir edeceğinizi biliyordum {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri!"
languages.original_text: "I knew you would appreciate my efforts to serve the Imperium as the law commands, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}!"
